issue.title: [C++] Examine "Field::dictionary" member
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-565](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-565). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
`[~tebeka]` noted that this member is being incorrect compared in `Field::Equals`

https://github.com/apache/arrow/commit/74685f386307171a90a9f97316e25b7f39cdd0a1#commitcomment-20909641

but this member isn't currently used. Now that we have DictionaryType and DictionaryArray, it's unclear if this is needed

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-565?focusedCommentId=15875150) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
I'm dealing with this in ARROW-459

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-565?focusedCommentId=15882765) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Resolved in https://github.com/apache/arrow/commit/d28f1c1e0f21bc578b84ab4bed4cf259c333fbc9 (the member was removed)
